GSD.description:
mmc: host: Return an error when ->enable_sdio_irq() ops is missing

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit e07547a45e507be37f6ab0e53c850f7720f6875f. For more details please see the references link.
